hierarchy.file_name: Impact--Fix segment-to-template mapping in sales initiation recommendations (positioning block insertion).docx

sections.text:
This change fixes a reliability issue in Sales Initiation Recommendations where accounts sometimes receive the wrong outreach template and/or the wrong Customer_Analyzer positioning block. The root cause is that template/positioning selection can be driven by a missing, stale, or recently changed account segment, causing incorrect segment-to-template mapping at the moment recommendations are generated.

With this update, recommendation generation will deterministically resolve the account’s current segment and consistently apply the correct outreach template and corresponding positioning block for that segment. When no valid segment or segment-specific positioning block exists, the system will fall back to a safe default template to avoid inserting incorrect content.

Customer impact is improved message relevance and reduced risk of sending mismatched positioning, which can degrade response rates and trust in recommendations. Internally, this reduces manual QA and “why did it choose this template?” investigations, and increases confidence that segment-based personalization behaves predictably as segments evolve.

To prevent recurrence, we will add regression coverage for the two key failure modes: (1) an account’s segment changing between runs and (2) missing segment and/or missing block configurations. This ensures correct behavior across segment transitions and enforces safe fallback behavior when segment data is unavailable.
